Background:

I am a designer and an engineer at heart.

I recently graduated from Rhode Island School of Design (RISD) with a master's degree in industrial design.

Between schools, I have 3+ years professional working experience in Bosch, MIT and full time teaching in Zhejiang University of Technology. Two of my design is coming to US market this year, and I've led a concept design project between Chicago and Hangzhou.
